attributes.action: get Methadone users to take their medication infront of their GP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since losing a brother of 19 yrs to the lethal substance Methadone, i believe that if the users had to drink it infront of their GP there wouldnt be any on the black market.

All these so called "clean" people that subtitute Methadone for Heroin are simply collecting it from their surgery or chemist and simply selling it on the street for the real thing.

There have been so many tragic deaths with this stuff, if you havnt built up a resistance to it you will die, people do not realise how dangerous it is.

It would take the GP or chemist dispenser 5 seconds of their time, and in return of those measley seconds would save lives
